scripts.build: npm run builden && npm run buildzh && gulp
scripts.builden: sh ./deploy-en.sh && node link.js && npm run clean && hexo generate && hexo game -u
scripts.buildzh: sh ./deploy-zh.sh && node link-en.js && npm run clean && hexo generate && hexo game -u
scripts.deployzh: npm run buildzh && gulp && hexo deploy
scripts.deployen: npm run builden && gulp && hexo deploy
scripts.serveren: npm run clean && sh ./deploy-en.sh && hexo game -u && hexo s -g
scripts.serverzh: npm run clean && sh ./deploy-zh.sh && hexo game -u && hexo s -g
